metadata.title: CVE-2019-6472 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A packet containing a malformed DUID can cause the Kea DHCPv6 serverprocess (kea-dhcp6) to exit due to an assertion failure. Versions affected:1.4.0 to 1.5.0, 1.6.0-beta1, and 1.6.0-beta2.

criterions.comment: isc-kea: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
